snippet: Linda Lavin returns to Broadway as Rita, the furious matriarch of the family in Nicky Silver’s play “The Lyons,” opening this month at the Cort Theater.
abstract: Linda Lavin returns to Broadway as Rita, the furious matriarch of the family in Nicky Silver’s play The Lyons; declined bigger roles to play challenging part.
